description: This creamy spread is made from a base of garlicky whipped chickpeas, with fresh basil, sun-dried tomatoes and kalamata olives. Is it a hummus or a tapenade? Who cares? It's delicious!
name: Sun-Dried Tomato & Kalamata Olive Hummus
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup torn fresh basil leaves, (lightly packed)
1/3 cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes, (dry, not oil-packed)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chickpeas, tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and cumin into the bowl of a food processor fitted with an S-blade. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed. Thin the mixture with a few splashes of water if needed.
Add the olives, basil, and sun-dried tomatoes to the bowl and pulse until everything is well chopped and fully incorporated into the hummus. Season with salt to taste, and serve.
